name: Profane
summary:
Profane is a 3D Bullet Hell that proposes a mechanic for life and currency based on time. This means that the player has to face every Boss and defeat them before the time runs out. Buying skills or being damaged during a game session, will reduce your remaining combat time. 
 
In Profane you embody Talaal, the last of God’s seven masks. Talaal finds her bearer just in time to fight against her siblings, that hunt her to absorb the power within the mask. 
 
Along your path, you will unlock abilities by defeating each boss. Before each battle you will be able to customize your ability loadouts to optimize your game style. 
 
The game will have a Twitch compatible mode allowing streamers to enable chat polls. These polls would let the viewers change the gameplay by voting one of the different options. Those options would consists of “packs” that contain one perk and one penalty.
storyline:
An archaeologist specialized in the Seven Heralds story, has discovered an ancient map that leads her to the ruins where he may find one of the masks of the story. 
 
Digging among the rubble, she finds the seventh mask, Talaal. Before she can even notice, the mask blasts a cyan light, projecting into her face, possessing her. An explosion of light with the same color floods the temple reaching the forest. 
 
Talaal, the embodiment of Pride, uses the human as it’s vessel to be able to use its immense power. 
 
The story will be seen from her perspective, her taken freedom, and her sentence of being condemned to bring life to who now rules her.
